api_results: In the given figure, a circle with center O1 and radius 5 is inscribed within an equilateral triangle ABC, which is itself circumscribed about the circle. Point M₀ is the midpoint of side BC. A line segment is drawn from vertex B to point M₀. Determine the length of segment BM₀.
